languages.text: Возопило создание и рекою гнили утекло в пустоту. Ибо слабым делают дух сомнения, а слабый всегда проигрывает сильному.
The creature wailed and trailed off into the void like a river of rot. For doubt weakens the spirit, and weakness always loses to strength.
languages.original_text: Возопило создание и рекою гнили утекло в пустоту. Ибо слабым делают дух сомнения, а слабый всегда проигрывает сильному.

traits.locale_text: The creature wailed and ran off into the void like a river of rot. For doubt weakens the spirit, and weakness always loses to strength.

The creature wailed and trailed off into the void like a river of rot. For doubt weakens the spirit, and weakness always loses to strength.

languages.text: Die Kreatur heulte und verschwand in der Leere wie ein Fluss voller Fäulnis. Denn zweifel schwächen den Geist, und Schwäche verliert immer gegen Stärke.
languages.original_text: The creature wailed and trailed off into the void like a river of rot. For doubt weakens the spirit, and weakness always loses to strength.

traits.locale_text: Die Kreatur heulte und verschwand in der Leere wie ein Fluss voller Fäulnis. Denn zweifel schwächen den Geist, und Schwäche verliert immer gegen Stärke.

languages.text: La criatura gimió y, como un río de podredumbre, se desvaneció en el vacío. Pues la duda debilita el espíritu, y la debilidad cae ante la fuerza.
languages.original_text: The creature wailed and trailed off into the void like a river of rot. For doubt weakens the spirit, and weakness always loses to strength.

traits.locale_text: La criatura gimió y, como un río de podredumbre, se desvaneció en el vacío. Pues la duda debilita el espíritu, y la debilidad cae ante la fuerza.

languages.text: その生き物は慟哭し、腐敗の川のようにヴォイドへと消えていった。疑いは精神を弱らせ、弱さは常に強さに負けるのだから。
languages.original_text: The creature wailed and trailed off into the void like a river of rot. For doubt weakens the spirit, and weakness always loses to strength.

traits.locale_text: その生き物は慟哭し、腐敗の川のようにヴォイドへと消えていった。疑いは精神を弱らせ、弱さは常に強さに負けるのだから。

languages.text: 怪物嚎啕大哭起来，仿佛腐烂的长河一般，渐渐消失在虚空之中。怀疑会削弱精神，而软弱之人终将在力量面前臣服。
languages.original_text: The creature wailed and trailed off into the void like a river of rot. For doubt weakens the spirit, and weakness always loses to strength.

traits.locale_text: 怪物嚎啕大哭起来，仿佛腐烂的长河一般，渐渐消失在虚空之中。怀疑会削弱精神，而软弱之人终将在力量面前臣服。

languages.text: La créature gémit et disparut dans le vide tel un torrent de putréfaction. Car le doute affaiblit l'esprit, et la force surpasse toujours la faiblesse.
languages.original_text: The creature wailed and trailed off into the void like a river of rot. For doubt weakens the spirit, and weakness always loses to strength.

traits.locale_text: La créature gémit et disparut dans le vide tel un torrent de putréfaction. Car le doute affaiblit l'esprit, et la force surpasse toujours la faiblesse.

languages.text: Yaratık, hayıflanarak çürükten bir nehir misali uçsuza doğru dağılıp gitti. Çünkü kuşku, ruhu zayıflatır. Zayıflıksa kuvvete yenilmeye mahkûmdur.
languages.original_text: The creature wailed and trailed off into the void like a river of rot. For doubt weakens the spirit, and weakness always loses to strength.
